products.title: Deluxe Cool Grey Venetian Blind
products.description: Deluxe aluminium venetian blinds. High quality aluminium in a range of styles and colours. Deluxe cool grey venetian blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Faux Suede Deluxe New Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Chic and on trend for today's living, the new grey faux suede blind will enhance your room interior. Its trending grey tone brings a crisp classy look that is perfect for any room in your home. Pair it perfectly with several colour palettes, including blush pinks, mustard yellows, and whites. This blind is great along side co-ordinating and contrasting curtains to give your window that perfect look.

products.title: Faux Suede Deluxe New Grey Curtain
products.description: Their faux suede range of fabric has proven to be one of their most popular roman blinds and curtains for many years. Still, at the forefront of fashion, the fabric makes sumptuous roman blinds and curtains. The faux suede new greycurtain in a lovelycolour is an excellent way to transform your home at an affordable price. Product id: db-cur0827 fabric colour: new grey material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes faux suede deluxe new grey curtain in grey.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Slate - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar slate deluxe is the perfect way to allow your home to really make a statement. With a rich variety of greys that allow you to see something different every time you look at them you'll be able to coordinate with your favourite shades as you reinvent any room in the house. Think about the contrasts you can create with light walls and floors and darker eye-catching accessories like scatter cushions and a lampshade.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Cool Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: With kalmar cool grey (deluxe) you'll be able to create a homely interior that is on-trend and right up to date with the latest colour trends. The off-white detailing of the grain is a great way to lighten the mood and take the edge off the dominant background colour. Turning the guest bedroom into the homely space that your friends and family will never want to leave is all about finding the right balance.

products.title: Perfect Fit Deluxe Cool Grey
products.description: Perfect fit venetian blinds are manufactured from high quality aluminium. Available in 42 colour shades. Perfect fit deluxe cool grey available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
